programme.title: A meeting of minds, 1981
programme.short_synopsis: Thatcher's visit to the new president is anticipated as a love-fest.
programme.medium_synopsis: Two leaders who share a common belief in their economic plans - but Mrs Thatcher's hopes are already moderating.
programme.long_synopsis:
Two leaders who share a common belief in their economic plans - but Mrs Thatcher's hopes are already moderating.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
